Edited November 8, 2014 by CG_Kerbin

Large explosions, in all cases.

Except not in KSP; they'd pass through one another harmlessly.

also sorry why does it have the red text saying animation? i dint add that and i dont want people to be missled

1) What would Happen - exactly what happened in the video, if we're talking in-game...

2) what if it was kerbin - uh, yeah, see answer 1...

3) what if it was earth - not possible... physical matter doesn't behave like in a game... unless you use the RSS mod, in which case, see answer 1...

4) what if it was jool - this is getting a bit repetitive... anything is possible in a game... not everything is possible in real life...

None of this meant negatively/harshly, just thought I would try to answer your questions...

4) what if it was jool - this is getting a bit repetitive... anything is possible in a game... not everything is possible in real life...

None of this meant negatively/harshly, just thought I would try to answer your questions...
